This is one exercise to practice how to use github with RStudio.

## Create A Pull Request

1. On https://github.com/Wenchao-Yang/gitexample, create a new branch from *master*

2. Copy the SSH key

3. Open RStudio, create a New Project --> Version Control --> Git --> Paste the SSH key to *Repository URL* and Browse the directory--> hit 'Create Project'

4.
